data.name: RPGScenery - Small Town Scene
data.detailed_description:
This small island town is the suburb and port of the big city behind it. The two are connected by a vast bridge that spans the ocean. Houses are built close together and almost completely cover the surface of the rocks. Most of them are multi-story and made of wood, with narrow roads winding like a maze between them. An underground tunnel system lies under the street, offering the perfect opportunity for hiding and unnoticed movement.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
